name: test_3[必填项为空创建个人活动码]

点击保存并生成活动码按钮

parameters.name: case
parameters.value: {'name': '必填项为空创建个人活动码(admin_driver)', 'steps': [(1, '点击导航栏渠道活码工具选项', 'click', "//span[contains(text(),'渠道活码工具')]", None), (2, '点击导航栏活动码选项', 'click', "//span[contains(text(),'活动码')]", None), (3, '点击导航栏个人活动码选项', 'click', "//span[contains(text(),'个人活动码')]", None), (4, '切换个人活动码主页', 'iframe_enter', '//iframe[@src="/marketing/personalActivityCode/page"]', None), (5, '点击创建个人活动码按钮', 'click', "//span[contains(text(),'创建个人活动码')]", None), (6, '退出页面', 'iframe_exit', None, None), (7, '切换创建个人活动码页面', 'iframe_enter', '//iframe[@src="/marketing/personalActivityCode/create"]', None), (8, '点击保存并生成活动码按钮', 'click', "//div[@class='buttonContainer']/button[2]/span", None), (9, '退出页面', 'iframe_exit', None, None), (10, '断言提示信息', 'assert_text_in', '/html/body/div[4]/div[1]', '未选择主理人'), (11, '切换创建个人活动码页面', 'iframe_enter', '//iframe[@src="/marketing/personalActivityCode/create"]', None), (12, '点击关联主理按钮', 'click', "//span[contains(text(),'选择关联主理')]", None), (13, '控件输入主理人名称', 'input', '//input[@placeholder = "搜索门店/主理人"]', 'U2店长'), (14, '控件输入框回车', 'keyboard_enter', '//input[@placeholder = "搜索门店/主理人"]', None), (15, '勾选全部主理人', 'click', "//span[contains(text(),'全部主理')]/../label/span/input", None), (16, '点击控件确认按钮', 'click', "//span[contains(text(),'确定')]", None), (17, '点击保存并生成活动码按钮', 'click', "//div[@class='buttonContainer']/button[2]/span", None), (18, '断言提示信息', 'assert_mandatory_field', None, '请输入活动名称,请选择渠道')]}
